libshapedraw.internal.bootstrap

Class LiteModLibShapeDraw

  • java.lang.Object
    • libshapedraw.internal.bootstrap.LSDBootstrapBase
      • libshapedraw.internal.bootstrap.LiteModLibShapeDraw
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.mumfrey.liteloader.api.Listener, com.mumfrey.liteloader.InitCompleteListener, com.mumfrey.liteloader.JoinGameListener, com.mumfrey.liteloader.LiteMod, com.mumfrey.liteloader.modconfig.Exposable, com.mumfrey.liteloader.Tickable, MinecraftAccess

    public class LiteModLibShapeDraw
extends LSDBootstrapBase
implements com.mumfrey.liteloader.InitCompleteListener, com.mumfrey.liteloader.JoinGameListener
    Internal class. Mods using the LibShapeDraw API can safely ignore this. Rather, instantiate LibShapeDraw.

    This is a LiteLoader mod (independent, but compatible with Forge/FML) that delegates bootstrapping LibShapeDraw to the wrapper abstraction (see LSDBootstrapBase).
